Override.locationdescription.tsm_abandoned: Abandoned site, the facilities are relatively intact, but there are no inhabitants
Override.randomnews8: The Coalition officially declares war on the Separatist
Override.randomnews9: Sea of Miracles will safeguard you
Override.talentdescription.tsm_operator_revolt: While wearing the Revolt Advancing Suit, and holding a stun baton with a round riot shield,gain‖color:0,150,0,255‖40% resistance to stun and physical damage‖color:end‖,‖color:0,150,0,255‖20% movement speed‖color:end‖,‖color:0,150,0,255‖200% melee attack speed‖color:end‖and reduce‖color:0,150,0,255‖30% damage dealt‖color:end‖
Override.afflictiondescription.triton_7L: Wounds caused by Triton 7L show induced decay, which if left untreated can induce tritium poisoning resulting in burns, etc.
Override.afflictioncauseofdeath.triton_7L: Severe tritium nucleation destroys your body's tissues.
Override.afflictioncauseofdeathself.triton_7L: Tritium nuclei fill your body and you begin to rot and fester.
Override.afflictiondescription.triton_7L.low: The wounds inflicted so far do not look serious, but there is a risk of deterioration.
Override.afflictiondescription.triton_7L: The bullet has penetrated your body, with intense burning at the wound site; some tissue has been expelled.
Override.afflictiondescription.triton_9C: The affected area is starting to rot, and you feel a churn in your stomach, wanting to vomit.
Override.afflictiondescription.triton_9C.low.self: Burning sensations start at the wound site, feeling as if it is on fire
Override.afflictiondescription.triton_9C.high.sel: You begin to feel dizzy and nauseous; the wound is rotting and decaying
Override.afflictiondescription.triton_9C.high: You cannot stop vomiting; symptoms of ulcers and various soft tissue decay appear.
Override.afflictiondescription.triton_burn: Burning sensations start at the wound site
Override.entitydescription.triton_9C_antidote: A medication used to treat Triton-9C disfiguration and burns.
Override.afflictiondescription.zlyz: You feel an invisible pressure immobilizing you
Override.afflictioncauseofdeathself.zlyz: Ignored the rules, faced the consequences
Override.afflictiondescription.zlqy: Let us sink together into the shadows woven between good and evil
Override.afflictiondescription.tsm_bl: After the bullet hits the body, the explosion creates shrapnel and pressure that directly injures the body; it seems that failing to treat these wounds properly will halve the effectiveness of treating other injuries
Override.afflictiondescription.tsm_bl.low: Some small shrapnel entered your body after the bullet exploded; it seems that failing to treat these wounds properly will halve the effectiveness of treating other injuries
Override.afflictiondescription.tsm_bl: High-explosive shells have destroyed some of your body tissues, and shrapnel and pressure rage within you.
Override.afflictiondescription.tsm_aftermath_succ:
Good treatment; the injured areas are well treated and bandaged, but it will still affect your repair and weapon usage, making it inconvenient to move
-50% repair speed
-20 weapon operation level
-20% movement speed
Override.afflictiondescription.tsm_aftermath_fail:
The doctor only ensures you don't die on the front lines; the treatment of wounds is poor, allowing you to move temporarily, but every movement causes pain
-70% repair speed
-30 weapon operation
-15 medical level
Now you can only walk
Override.afflictiondescription.tsm_armor_allbuff: Resistance Against Various Types of Damage
Override.afflictiondescription.tsm_kep_buff: Slightly increases the operator's damage and stun resistance, and allows the operator to have a faster shooting speed.\n\nThree Divine Hills Squad? Unfortunately, I couldn't keep any of them, but their sacrifices paved the way for the operators that followed.
Override.afflictiondescription.tsm_anger:
Experimental Injection

Research Location: Jiu Zhou Research Institute

Enhancement Type:
Land/Water movement speed 20%
Maximum health 20%
Melee attack speed 20%
Melee damage 15%

Usage Permission: II
Override.subcategory.TSM: Sea of Miracles provides protection for you\nNot judged by success or failure, but in heroism.
Override.entitydescription.triton_9C_antidote: A medicine used to treat Tritium poisoning, Triton injuries, and blast wounds.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_medicalkits: A standard medical kit produced by The Sea of Miracles, containing sufficient medical instruments to handle most common situations on the battlefield, used for treating physical injuries, burns, and bleeding. This medical kit is not expensive and is sold without returns or exchanges.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_medicalkits_s: An enhanced medical kit produced by The Sea of Miracles, equipped with sufficient medical supplies for performing battlefield surgeries, used for treating physical injuries, burns, and bleeding. This medical kit is expensive but worth the price.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_anger: Used in conjunction with the operator assistance system to enhance combat capabilities.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_sks_skins_zjgz: Thanks for CosmoChromE’s assistance to this mod, awarded with custom camo
Override.entitydescription.tsm_vhs2_skins_t037y: Dedicated to the most powerful warrior\nDefeat the most powerful creature in the mod:T037Y，Getting materials to make
Override.entitydescription.tsm_hk433_skins_t037y: Dedicated to the most powerful warrior\nDefeat the most powerful creature in the mod:T037Y，Getting materials to make
Override.entitydescription.tsm_dp12_skins_t037y: Dedicated to the most powerful warrior\nDefeat the most powerful creature in the mod:T037Y，Getting materials to make
Override.entitydescription.tsm_pq: Can only be manufactured by large industrial equipment at the site, used to spray your favorite coating on firearms.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_weaponbox: Contains some general parts and disposable tools, usable for manufacturing and modifying Coalition standard weapons.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_yh_weaponbox: Contains some general parts and disposable tools, usable for modifying and manufacturing Separatist standard weapons.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_handgun_box: A universal rough model for handguns, which can be modified into the desired pistol according to needs.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_blueprint: Records the design of standard weapons used by the Coalition, which can be used as a reference for manufacturing Coalition standard weapons.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_blueprint1: Records the design of The Sea of Miracles weapons, which can be used as a reference for manufacturing firearms.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_bg_licences: A certificate used at NPCs to exchange for Tritium core packages.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_triton_bag: A small package of Tritium core, used at the processing table to craft items related to the Triton projectile. This packaging does not completely prevent the internal Tritium core from leaking, and it needs to be placed in a The Sea of Miracles anomaly containment box to avoid burning.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_danger_box: A specialized box for containing anomalies, featuring two compartments.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_fabricator: Used to manufacture all types of ammunition and firearms within the Jiu Zhou Armory. Installation method: Hold it in your hand, right-click to aim, and then press the use key (default is E) to install.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_fabricator_ammo: Fabricator used only for fabricating ammo\nInstallation method: Hold it in your hand, right-click to aim, and then press the use key (default is E) to install.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_fabricator_quality: Fabricator used only for upgrading item quality\nInstallation method: Hold it in your hand, right-click to aim, and then press the use key (default is E) to install.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_sniper_turret: Using a high-density enegy fusion core, it fires high-energy beams through minature particle accelerators with astounding range and precision, while having extremely high anti-distruption ability, helping it lock on to target in all kinds of complex battle environments.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_sniper_ammobox: Contains enough energy for 50 shots of the sniper turret, its energy beams could instantly collapse structures on impact, easily penetrating heavy armor.
Override.entityname.tsm_sniper_ammobox_sj: T.S.M Sniper Turret Armor-Piercing Fuel Box
Override.entitydescription.tsm_sniper_ammobox_sj: The internal energy supply is sufficient to support 40 consecutive shots from the sniper cannon. The armor-piercing energy beam can rapidly corrode the target's defenses upon impact.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_suecide_vest: Spread terror to the world, 10-second countdown begins after activation
Override.entitydescription.tsm_jz_c4: Just throw it where you need the explosion, the rest is up to the button
Override.entitydescription.tsm_jz_m57detonator: Used to detonate the C4 Explosive,you just need to press the button, the rest is up to the C4
Override.entitydescription.tsm_c2: An inert explosive used to demolish doors in counter-terrorist operations, capable of demolishing cover while acting as a non-lethal means to stun enemies
Override.entitydescription.tsm_fs_backpack: Used to transmit a support signal\nUsed with the Handheld Support Pointer,one wearing the backpack，while the other holds the pointer to mark an area
Override.entitydescription.tsm_firesupportbinocle: Used to mark the target area\nUsed with the Handheld Support Pointer,one wearing the backpack，while the other holds the pointer to mark an area
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_lockbox: Fantastic Gacha Mechanics, no guarantee at all, Barotrauma in a nutshell\nOpen using an ally identification code\Open with Left click+Right click after the condition reaches zero
Time for a 10 pull\nOpen using an ally identification code\Open with Left click+Right click after the condition reaches zero
Override.entitydescription.tsm_fkj_lockbox: Fantastic Gacha Mechanics, no guarantee at all, Barotrauma in a nutshell\nOpen using an ally identification code\Open with Left click+Right click after the condition reaches zero
Time for a 10 pull\nOpen using an ally identification code\Open with Left click+Right click after the condition reaches zero
Override.entitydescription.tsm_tsm_lockbox: Fantastic Gacha Mechanics, no guarantee at all, Barotrauma in a nutshell\nOpen using an ally identification code\Open with Left click+Right click after the condition reaches zero
Time for a 10 pull\nOpen using an ally identification code\Open with Left click+Right click after the condition reaches zero
Override.entitydescription.tsm_claymore_mine: Tested and refined anti-infantry mine, detonates ofter the target triggers the motion sensor\nIt is advisable to deploy this on enemies' path, or at undefended entrances. to create a security perimeter\nTurning it on or off has a three second delay.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_bulletproof: Perhaps those soldiers who like to carry large amounts of ammunition couldn't bear it anymore; this chest rig appeared on Europa. By sacrificing some protection, it provides more carry pouches for storing additional items.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_medical_vest: A white bulletproof vest with numerous carry pouches for medications, all of which signal to those around that the wearer is a skilled medic. If injured, find him, and you won't go wrong.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_general_vest: A plain bulletproof vest with moderate protective performance and two carry pouches.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_old_uniform: The standard combat suit from The Sea of Miracles. Although its performance does not match the latest designs from various departments, its cheap and durable attributes are still favored by most tactical teams.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_old_vest: Offers more protected areas than a standard bulletproof vest, but its protective performance is not particularly good.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_advanced_uniform: Uniform of the Advanced Combat Department.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_sundawn_uniform: A security uniform worn by the Sunset Combat Department during internal security periods.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_pgvest: A bulletproof vest modified by the Jiu Zhou Armory, featuring insert plate slots that can accommodate corresponding insert plates to protect against specific damage.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_heavy_vest: A bulletproof vest issued by The Sea of Miracles to cope with more complex environments, offering greater protection without hindering soldiers' movements, and equipped with more tactical mounting points.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_pgc_uniform: A combat suit exclusively used by the Lerentine Guardian Squad, featuring numerous convenient decorations and patterns for processing. It is sturdy, durable, and extremely comfortable, with small hidden pockets under the decorative designs for carrying several magazines or grenades.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_pgc_helmet: The standard helmet for the Guardian Squad, with reserved chip positions. Installing different chips provides various effects.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_jz_uniform: The uniform for the Jiu Zhou Combat Department. Enhanced effects against blunt force impacts and bites, with carry pouches on the clothing that can hold some equipment, providing a comfortable wearing experience.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_jz_helmet: The standard helmet for the Jiu Zhou Combat Department, modified from the advanced combat helmet, featuring built-in night vision that requires electric activation.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_jz_vest: The standard armor for the Jiu Zhou Combat Department, made from advanced combat armor as a base, requiring regular maintenance to ensure adequate protective performance.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_riotcontrol_helmet: Effectively prevents both civilian weapons and blunt instruments from harming the wearer's head.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_heavycombat_helmet: Thicker inner lining, providing stronger impact resistance.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_helmet_outpost_com: A special combat helmet designed specifically for site assaults in The Sea of Miracles, currently only equipped for a small number of site assault troops.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_nujiang_uniform: A combat suit criticized for its design; this is not to say its protective effects are poor, but its overall appearance resembles that of a plumber. Therefore, every time the site assault squad goes on a mission, someone always jokes about going to fix the toilets at some site.
Override.entitydescription.lm_rapidreaction_helme: A helmet specifically for rapid response troops, capable of resisting direct bullet hits and featuring night vision. Remember to replace the batteries in time to maintain equipment and information advantages.
Override.entitydescription.lm_rapidreaction_vest: A bulletproof vest specifically for the Coalition task force, sturdier than standard bulletproof vests, with excellent bulletproof performance. It shone in the Splinter War, protecting the lives of many task force members.
Override.entitydescription.lm_rapidreaction_unifo: A combat suit specifically for the Coalition task force; while it is not bulletproof, it is sturdy, durable, and warm. The pockets on the clothing allow the wearer to carry more items.
Override.entitydescription.lm_fast_helmet: A standard helmet widely distributed to basic soldiers, featuring numerous attachment points for various modification options.
Override.entitydescription.lm_fast_helmet_headset: Equipped with a set of radio earphones, allowing officers' and colleagues' voices to be transmitted to the soldier's ears more quickly.
Override.entitydescription.lm_fast_helmet_faceshi: A large transparent bulletproof visor is installed on top, providing a certain level of protection to the most dangerous part of the body, the face.
Override.entitydescription.lm_fast_helmet_thermal: A standard helmet equipped with a head-mounted thermal imaging device, featuring an excellent suspension system that keeps the center of gravity unchanged. Remember to frequently change the batteries to ensure the thermal imaging device is operational.
Override.entitydescription.lm_fast_helmet_protect: A communication headset with a jaw guard, providing even better protection for the wearer.
Override.entitydescription.lm_beowulf_helmet: A standard helmet equipped for the Beowulf squad, with superior performance that allows outstanding soldiers to execute tactics and orders more calmly.
Override.entitydescription.lm_beowulf_uniform: A standard combat suit equipped for the Beowulf squad.
Override.entitydescription.lm_occupation_helmet: A helmet equipped with a jaw guard and large transparent protective visor, effectively bulletproof and resistant to cuts, and can effectively prevent concussions from impacts.
Override.entitydescription.lm_vest_pt: A standard bulletproof vest with average performance, characterized by fewer carry pouches and a design that does not hinder soldier movement.
Override.entitydescription.lm_vest_elite: A bulletproof vest made from new materials, offering stronger protection than the original design, but still only has a few carry pouches.
Override.entitydescription.lm_vest_beowulf: Excellent performance without sacrificing mobility; this bulletproof vest also features additional carry pouches, allowing the wearer to carry more ammunition for mission completion.
Override.entitydescription.lm_vest_occupation: This thick bulletproof vest effectively protects the wearer, with several spacious carry pouches enabling soldiers to carry more ammunition. However, its thickness may affect the soldier's use of weapons and tools.
Override.entitydescription.lm_stormyseas_uniform: A common combat suit in the Coalition; while it lacks space for storing magazines, its excellent quality control has ensured it has never received negative reviews.
Override.entitydescription.fkj_anonymous_uniform: A combat suit made from new materials that slightly sacrifices bulletproof performance for corrosion resistance and hemorrhage resistance, featuring four large pockets for carrying more ammunition. However, the glove issue remains unresolved, and the use of medical supplies by the wearer is still not recommended.
Override.entitydescription.fkj_abyssrambler_unifo: The standard combat suit for the Separatists, made with solid materials and good quality. The small pockets sewn onto it allow soldiers to carry personal items or ammunition. The gloves are made from overly solid material (too thick), making the use of medical supplies inadvisable for soldiers.
Override.entitydescription.fkj_yehuo_uniform: An excellent combat suit with a very good wearing experience. For some reason, wearers seem clumsy when using tools.
Override.entitydescription.fkj_fast_helmet: A standard helmet, while its performance is barely adequate, the designer has provided numerous slots for custom modifications and upgrades.
Override.entitydescription.fkj_fast_helmet_reinfo: Features ear protection, upgraded inner lining, and shock absorption design, effectively reducing the likelihood of the wearer suffering a concussion from severe impacts.
Override.entitydescription.fkj_fast_helmet_therma: Equipped with a head-mounted thermal imaging device. Due to a shift in the center of gravity, the helmet is unstable after taking hits, slightly reducing its protective effect. If you wish to consistently use the convenience of thermal imaging, remember to change the batteries frequently.
Override.entitydescription.fkj_Anonymous_helmet: Equipped with ear protection and goggles, utilizing a new cushioning structure to effectively resist the Coalition's new type of ammunition.
Override.entitydescription.fkj_yehuo_helmet: A new type of all-protection helmet, providing the best protection for your head, even your chin is covered!
Override.entitydescription.fkj_vest_pt: Nothing much to say, just a standard Separatist bulletproof vest with several carry pouches for magazines and grenades.
Override.entitydescription.fkj_vest_elite: Improved internal design and material innovation based on the ordinary bulletproof vest, providing soldiers with some resistance against the Coalition's new bullets, although carry pouches are still limited.
Override.entitydescription.fkj_heavy_vest: A thick bulletproof vest that gives the wearer a strong sense of security; wearing it makes you the thickest meat shield in submarine urban warfare! (The Separatist advises you not to actually be a meat shield; remember to carry a shield.)
Override.entitydescription.fkj_vest_yehuo: A bulletproof vest reserved for the elite among the Separatist, featuring extensive use of new materials and excellent strap structure that provide high bulletproof performance and hemorrhage resistance, capable of withstanding some of the Coalition's new bullets.
Override.entitydescription.adventists_uniform: The robe often worn by leaders of the Ascendant Sect, symbolizing their status. It is quite warm to wear on the cold icy surface.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_armor_allbuff: Developed by Meier Yu's research team, this all-protective armor plate integrates various types of protective armor, achieving more protective effects; however, it is more prone to damage compared to single-type protection, and the protection level does not meet the highest standards.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_armor_bleeding:
Bleeding protection armor plate

Research Location: Jiu Zhou Armory

Protection Type: Bleeding

Protection Level: III
Override.entitydescription.tsm_armor_lacerations:
Laceration injury protection armor plate

Research Location: Jiu Zhou Armory

Protection Type: Laceration

Protection Level: III
Override.entitydescription.tsm_armor_stun:
Stun protection armor plate

Research Location: Jiu Zhou Armory

Protection Type: Stun

Protection Level: III
Override.entityname.tsm_armor_blunttrauma: TSM Technology - Blunt Force Protection Plate
Override.entitydescription.tsm_armor_blunttrauma:
Blunt force injury protection armor plate

Research Location: Jiu Zhou Armory

Protection Type: Blunt Force

Protection Level: II
Override.entityname.tsm_armor_huskinfection: TSM Technology - Husk Infection Protection Plate
Override.entitydescription.tsm_armor_huskinfectio:
Husk Infection protection armor plate

Research Location: Jiu Zhou Armory

Protection Type: Husk Infection

Protection Level: IV
Override.entitydescription.tsm_armor_paralysis:
Paralysis protection armor plate

Research Location: Jiu Zhou Armory

Protection Type: Paralysis

Protection Level: IV
Override.entityname.tsm_armor_triton: TSM Technology - Special Damage Protection Plate
Override.entitydescription.tsm_armor_triton:
Special protection armor plate

Research Location: Jiu Zhou Armory

Protection Type: Triton/Explosion

Protection Level: II
Override.entitydescription.tsm_armor_bitewounds:
Bite protection armor plate

Research Location: Jiu Zhou Armory

Protection Type: Bite

Protection Level: II
Override.entitydescription.tsm_armor_explosiondam:
Deep tissue damage protection armor plate

Research Location: Jiu Zhou Armory

Protection Type: Deep Tissue Damage

Protection Level: II
Override.entitydescription.tsm_armor_gunshotwound:
Gunshot protection armor plate

Research Location: Jiu Zhou Armory

Protection Type: Gunshot

Protection Level: II
Override.entitydescription.tsm_xjzz_suit: This military-grade protective suit is mainly equipped by the Advanced Combat Department in the The Sea of Miracles, capable of adapting to many harsh environments. When paired with magnetic shoes, it can maintain stability under minor floods, with a maximum dive depth of 6000 meters.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_orangeconstant_sui: Hazardous environment protective suit, with a maximum dive depth of 6000 meters.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_typeiexposure_suit: Modified from military protective suits, this suit incorporates advanced life and biological maintenance technology. Special fibers separate the wearer from harsh environments. The helmet has a built-in night vision device, greatly improving effectiveness, while specialized shoes securely grip the ground, reducing impact from shocks, with a maximum dive depth of 8000 meters.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_bltj_suit: Modified from military protective suits, using alien material to fabricate armor plate for defense, fitted with riot control module, makes the user capable of swinging stun batons faster, aggressive appearance to intimidate rioters, capable of withstanding 6000m depths.
Override.entitydescription.rz_prototype: Due to various reasons and the increasingly severe situation, the headquarters of the The Sea of Miracles urgently needed a heavy fire support platform that could enter submarines. Thus, the “Rongzhuang” heavy fire platform prototype was born.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_rz_2b: This is a combat platform equipped with heavy firepower. The operator can enter and exit the body more quickly, and the heavy firepower mounted on the arms can easily respond to various situations inside submarines, but it is still a platform for technical verification. Uses ‖color:150,0,0,255‖Rongzhuang Magazines‖color:end‖ for ammunition supply.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_rz_pirent: Original Type B body, modified by bandits to enhance protective and output capabilities.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_rz_pirent_k: Original Type B body, modified by bandits to enhance protective and output capabilities.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_kepuniform: As an experimental team for operators, headquarters designed a dedicated combat system for them, but it needs to be paired with the Three Divine Hills combat helmet and cloak to activate.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_kepcape: A dedicated cloak for the Three Divine Hills experimental team, designed to withstand a certain amount of damage, and it also has some resistance to Triton bullets. When paired with the Three Divine Hills combat suit and helmet, it can activate the auxiliary system.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_kepcap: A dedicated combat helmet for the Three Divine Hills team, it has a certain amount of defense and can be used with chips. When paired with the combat suit and cloak, it can activate the auxiliary system.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_advisers_vest: Made from alien minerals, this bulletproof plate offers higher protection without hindering the movement of combat personnel.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_advisers_mask: Issued to the consultant team for outdoor missions, this mask effectively hides their identity.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_advisers_uniform: The most professional team, reasonably priced, honest service. The Feline Consultants are always on the front lines, providing the best quality service.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_65_uniform: Brave soldiers of the Hundred Battles New Division, three years of hard struggle for my life.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_65_hat: In the drizzling night rain, the troops are washed clean, and the hot blood solidifies the golden vase.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_63_gear: Returning to the spring to summon the old troops, with banners to cut down Yan Luo.
Override.entitydescription.CODE002: This seems to be a music tape. If I remember correctly, the adjacent MOD: “When Will You Return?” has a player for this type of tape; it might be worth checking out.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_daylight: Illuminates the surroundings as bright as daytime on Earth.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_jgzsq: Can be inserted into the gun to provide friendly identification without harming allies, but it will be ineffective underwater.\n-5% rate of fire\n-10% damage
Override.entitydescription.tsm_thermalgoggles: Installed in the The Sea of Miracles helmet, this chip unlocks thermal imaging capabilities.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_healthscanner: Installed in the The Sea of Miracles helmet, this chip unlocks health scanner capabilities.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_operatorassistance: Operator Riot Maker Initiator\n\nThe Operator Assistance System can provide necessary treatment in crisis situations, as well as communication functions.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_grip_straight:
Small increase to stability

Override.entitydescription.tsm_sight_reddot: Slightly increase sight range while holding weapons, reduce spread while firing\n+25% Skill gain speed\n-4% Movement speed
Override.entitydescription.tsm_sight_holographic: Slightly increase sight range while holding weapons, reduce spread while firing\n+25% Skill gain speed\n-4% Movement speed
Override.entitydescription.tsm_sight_double: Increase sight range while holding weapons\n-10% Spread\n-7% Movement Speed

Override.entitydescription.tsm_sight_c79: Significantly increase sight range while holding weapons\n-13% Spread\n-12% Movement speed
Override.entitydescription.tsm_sight_hamr: Provides Health Scanner effect\n+10% Weapons skill gain
Override.entitydescription.tsm_sight_acog:
Slightly increase sight range while holding weapons
+30% Weapons skill gain
-5% Spread

Override.entitydescription.tsm_sight_thermal: Provides Thermal Goggles Effect\n+10% Weapons skill gain
Override.entitydescription.tsm_flame_arrester: Slightly increase weapon damage\n+13% Damage\n-3% Fire rate
Override.entitydescription.tsm_recoil: Slightly increase weapon damage and accuracy\n+10% Damage\n-7% Spread
Override.entitydescription.tsm_advanced_sight:
Type 95 Longbow Kit Scope, slightly increase sight range while holding weapons
+25% Weapons skill gain
-7% Spread
-5% Movement speed
Override.entitydescription.tsm_advanced_barrel: Advanced QBU-191 precision rifle dedicated barrel, paired with the weapon to become a precision marksman rifle\n+60% damage\n-50% rate of fire
Override.entitydescription.tsm_advanced_grip: Provides certain stability after installation\nReduces 40% spread, reduces 20% movement speed, increases 40% water resistance
Override.entitydescription.tsm_03_sight: Dedicated Type 03 Rifle Scope, slightly increase sight range while holding weapons\n-10% Spread\n-5% Movement speed
Override.entitydescription.tsm_sight_qmk152:
Type 191 photoelectric aiming system
+5 Weapons skill
-12% Spread
-7% Movement speed
Override.entitydescription.tsm_gun_grenade_lm: Underbarrel kit for M4 and M16 series, can launch grenades after installation
Override.entitydescription.tsm_square_riotshields: A heavy shield made of high-density ballistic fibers and high-strength titanium-aluminum alloy, capable of completely shielding the user's body, allowing steady advancement amidst gunfire.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_stunbaton_melee: Installed with Ray Sub Battery to provide more powerful control
Override.entitydescription.tsm_moonlight_sword: ‖color:255,144,48,255‖An honorary melee weapon, a ring-hilted katana made from alien materials‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.tsm_pmf_melee: A tool for breaching, commonly used in Sea of Miracles
Override.entitydescription.tsm_pqc_melee: A tool for breaking walls, commonly used in Sea of Miracles
Override.entitydescription.tsm_thermal_knife: This blade's manufacturing process is not disclosed. It is lightweight, and can reach high temperatures in a very short time, making cutting efficiency high.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_steel_knife: A symbol of status, forged from expensive alien metals. Before Earth lost contact, it was awarded to captains who bravely ventured into the unknown.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_beowulf_melee: A bloodstained warhammer, symbolizing the Beowulf Squadron's relentless suppression of extremists. Any enemy who falls into their hands faces execution by hammer without mercy, a brutal display of the alliance's iron will and unyielding authority. \nuTraitors, riot organizers, and propagators of terror... all are sentenced to death by the hammer.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lerentine_zhong: ‖color:221,106,29,255‖Born in shadow, not bound by form in life; dead, the soul does not connect with my dreams‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.tsm_zhong_handgun: ‖color:221,106,29,255‖Lerentine's sidearm, uses hand cannon ammunition. It is said to have been the sidearm of her squad leader in the advanced operations department. When they were ambushed, the leader died trying to save her. She later picked up this gun, donned the leader's helmet, and issued commands. "Omen Scion of Heaven" they called her. She is a child of the Sea of Miracles, your last hope when shrouded in death.‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.tsm_scarl: Uses Coalition‖color:0,200,0,255‖5.56‖color:end‖Magazine, one of Yan Shu Ting’s weapons, equipped with a tactical flashlight, it has been equipped by the Feline consultants before, but it isn’t well-liked due to the meager power, however Yan modified it to fire .45 rounds for close range self-defense against unarmored targets.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_usp45_pistols: Uses ‖color:0,200,0,255‖.45ACP‖color:end‖ Pistol Magazine， one of Yan Shu Ting’s weapons, equipped with a tactical flashlight, it has been equipped by the Feline consultants before, but it isn’t well-liked due to the meager power, however Yan modified it to fire .45 rounds for close range self-defense against unarmored targets.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_m200: Uses‖color:0,200,0,255‖10.36*77‖color:end‖Sniper Magazine,Yan’s main weapon, a gift to her from a friend in the Feline consultants, rumored to be the only one on europa. Its precise manufacturing is a main difficulty, but even more significant is the lack of a need for a high-precision sniper rifle on europa, except for the Feline consultants. This legendary gun that could hit an oxygen tank from a kilometer away, has silently took the lives of many arrogant fools.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_m7: Uses Coalition ‖color:0,200,0,255‖6.8*51‖color:end‖ Magazine, the equipped version of the MCX spear, but it is only given to the elite among the elite, including Chris. The scratch marks on the gun stock records the prey that have fallen to the Beowulf squadron, giving anyone a chill down the spine.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_beowulf: The Coalition awarded a special medal to the Beowulf Squadron in recognition of their outstanding contributions to riot control and counter-terrorism efforts over the years.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_rp: Chris Evans\nA Moment More Brilliant Than Tears
Override.tsm_chris_c1: In the crowd you see someone who looks familiar, and to verify your suspicions you run up and call out to him. “Haven't we met somewhere before?” He just turned around, and your eyes immediately caught a hideous, deep scar on his face - sure enough, unsurprisingly, he was none other than the former leader of Beowulf Squadron, who was once wanted by the Alliance - Chris Evans.
Override.tsm_chris_p1: Even though his expression was as cold as ice, there was still a trace of imperceptible fluctuation that swept through his eyes in that moment.
Override.tsm_chris_c2: His hand slowly reached for his waist, his movements seemingly calm but full of oppression, as if the air would be suffocated by ignition in the next second. Your gazes met at this moment, as sharp as blades meeting, and the atmosphere suddenly froze, dropping to freezing point. “Hey! Take it easy, I think we're on the same page” You raise your hands, palms facing outwards, and swing them slowly, trying to break the tension in front of you with a calm tone. You don't move very much, fearing that the slightest mistake could lead to an irreversible confrontation. Chris stares at you, his hand stopping at his waist as if weighing the truth of your words. After a moment, he finally relaxes a bit, but still hasn't completely removed his defenses.
Override.tsm_chris_p2: “Follow me.” You whisper, nodding to him, and then slowly turn around, moving carefully for fear of arousing his suspicions.
Override.tsm_chris_c3: You lead him through several dimly lit passages until you come to a remote corner - undisturbed and free of surveillance eyes. “It's safe here, so we can talk.” You settle against the wall, your eyes looking straight at him, your tone calm but not careless . “Abuse of force, violent lynching, murder, insubordination ...... each of these charges is written under your name.” Your voice is low, yet sharp as a blade, each word seems to pierce the air and drive right into his heart, “Now, the people of Europa talk about you like you're the messenger of death. Seeing you, it's as if life will be taken from them in the next second.” “Join me!” Your tone is firm with a sincerity that can't be ignored, and your gaze is like a razor's edge as you look straight at Chris, “With me, you're absolutely safe. The Coalition's most wanted, those hounds hunting you, none of them can threaten you. I have the power to protect you from being consumed by their schemes and shackles.” You take a slight step forward, lowering your voice but making each word as clear as thunder, “And not just protection - I can give you the chance to liquidate those who are guilty. Those elements that started the chaos and provoked the riots should not escape the judgment they deserve!” When Chris heard the words “liquidate those who are guilty”, a light flashed in his originally cold eyes, as if it had ignited some long-buried emotions deep inside him. He exhaled a mouthful of smoke, narrowed his eyes, and slowly spoke, “I don't care about the Coalition's wanted, they've been trying to catch me for more than a day or two.” He paused, with a few hints of testing and disdain in his tone, “On the contrary, it's the trial you mentioned that does make me a bit interested. But empty words are no proof, come up with something tangible, how do you prove that you have the strength that can make me join. “On Europa, only the truly powerful are qualified to talk about judgment and order. What about you? What are you entitled to?”
Override.tsm_chris_p3: Here's my proof. (pulls out Beowulf Medal of Honor)
Override.tsm_chris_p_e: I never cared about the process, I only cared about the result
Override.tsm_chris_c_e2: Looks like you'll have to have more lighters on board. Come on, Captain, let's get ready to liquidate the guilty!
Override.tsm_chris_c_n: Don't bother me if you can't prove your strength!
Override.entitydescription.tsm_12_ld: Fewer rounds but with greater power.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_sabot: Innovative double-shot design, where the outer projectile detaches upon hitting the target and quickly flips inside to cause damage.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_12_bg: Tritium fusion core, Tritium fragment killing component
Override.entitydescription.tsm_handcannonround: Large-caliber armor-piercing bullet developed by Sea of Miracles
Override.entitydescription.tsm_handcannonround_co: An inexpensive handcannon ammo; don't underestimate its low damage, as it is cheap.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_58_fulgurium_mag: loaded with 30 rounds of 5.8 caliber Fulgarium ammo，these rounds can make the enemy feel what it's like getting tased
Override.entitydescription.tsm_58_physicorium_mag: loaded with 30 rounds of 5.8 caliber Physicorium ammo，Increasing damage using its Physicorium base
Override.entitydescription.tsm_58_sulphuriteshard: loaded with 30 rounds of 5.8 caliber Sulphuric Acid ammo，emits acid to burn enemies on hit
Override.entitydescription.tsm_58_incendium_mag: loaded with 30 rounds of 5.8 caliber Incendium ammo，Igniting enemies using the properties of Incendium
Override.entitydescription.tsm_magazine_fulgurium: loaded with 30 rounds of Fulgarium ammo，these rounds can make the enemy feel what it's like getting tased
Override.entitydescription.tsm_magazine_physicori: loaded with 30 rounds of Physicorium ammo，Increasing damage using its Physicorium base
Override.entitydescription.tsm_magazine_sulphurit: loaded with 30 rounds of Sulphuric Acid ammo，emits acid to burn enemies on hit
Override.entitydescription.tsm_magazine_incendium: loaded with 30 rounds of Incendium ammo，Igniting enemies using the properties of Incendium
Override.entitydescription.fkj_545_fulgurium_mag: loaded with 30 rounds of 5.45*39 caliber Fulgarium ammo，these rounds can make the enemy feel what it's like getting tased
Override.entitydescription.fkj_545_physicorium_ma: loaded with 30 rounds of 5.45*39 caliber Physicorium ammo，Increasing damage using its Physicorium base
Override.entitydescription.fkj_545_sulphuriteshar: loaded with 30 rounds of 5.45*39 caliber Sulphuric Acid ammo，emits acid to burn enemies on hit
Override.entitydescription.fkj_545_incendium_mag: loaded with 30 rounds of 5.45*39 caliber Incendium ammo，Igniting enemies using the properties of Incendium
Override.entitydescription.lm_556_fulgurium_mag: loaded with 30 rounds of 5.56*45 caliber Fulgarium ammo，these rounds can make the enemy feel what it's like getting tased
Override.entitydescription.lm_556_physicorium_mag: loaded with 30 rounds of 5.56*45 caliber Physicorium ammo，Increasing damage using its Physicorium base
Override.entitydescription.lm_556_sulphuriteshard: loaded with 30 rounds of 5.56*45 caliber Sulphuric Acid ammo，emits acid to burn enemies on hit
Override.entitydescription.lm_556_incendium_mag: loaded with 30 rounds of 5.56*45 caliber Incendium ammo，Igniting enemies using the properties of Incendium
Override.entitydescription.tsm_fragmentation_gren: A common type of grenade using a delayed fuse, with a fragmentation kill radius of 6-10. When held, right-click then press 'E' to sequentially pull the safety pin and release the firing pin spoon.
Override.entityname.tsm_holiday_g11: G11 Caseless Assault Rifle·2024 Christmas Special
Override.entitydescription.tsm_holiday_g11: 2024 Christmas Special Voting Event\nAn experimental caseless assault rifle, fires custom caseless rounds, uses propellant to replace traditional shells, 50 round magazine, needs to be placed in an ammo loader to reload. Its internal structure is as complex as clockwork, so continued firing could lead to malfunction, it is way more valuable as a collection item than a weapon.\nCould be reloaded when placed in an ammo box
Override.entitydescription.tsm_m500: Uses‖color:0,200,0,255‖Handcannon Round‖color:end‖，he large caliber causes it to only load 5 rounds, if you’re not looking for a broken wrist, it’s best not to try it.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_jm: Uses‖color:0,200,0,255‖Handcannon Round‖color:end‖，luxury among pistols, well-made, symbol of power, the most prideful captains are rumored to duel with it.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_mr74: Uses‖color:0,200,0,255‖Handcannon Round‖color:end‖，the most simple and well-known handcannon, no matter if it’s coalition captains or pirate scum would all like one.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_zc: No design can withstand drug-enhanced bullets; practice is needed to hit accurately. However, its suppressor is quite good. Uses ‖color:150,0,0,255‖Sea of Miracles ammunition‖color:end‖.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_rsmagazine: Special magazine exclusively for two rifles, Chariot and Flying Raven.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_magazine: Standard magazine that can hold 30 rounds of 5.8mm ammunition. However, reports indicate that using this magazine allows for continuous fire up to 33 times. — Don't joke! This magazine can only hold 30 rounds!
Override.entitydescription.tsm_identifier: Identification code of Sea of Miracles, which can be synthesized with sonar beacons and flares into various drop pod flares.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_ammunition_resuppl: After use, can summon an airdrop capsule.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_snoar_shell: Railgun Shell\nDecoy-type artillery missile that stops around 150m after launch and continuously emits a sonar pulse to attract creatures. Please note the strong EMP effects within the explosion radius.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_embi_shell: Railgun Shell Special ballistic correction artillery nuclear bomb developed and manufactured by EMBI. This ammunition can correct its trajectory within a certain range.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_fire_gun: Sub-throw Launcher Single-use bombardment launcher capable of disrupting enemy formations.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_thbq: Sea of Miracles's standard assault rifle, developed for external combat, offers exceptional suppression due to its high rate of fire, allowing ordinary soldiers to achieve squad-level fire density. The specialized armor-piercing ammunition is an added bonus. After installing specialized components, it becomes even more formidable, deadlier, and pricier... Using ‖color:150,0,0,255‖Sea of Miracles ammunition‖color:end‖ "Burlinghill, they told you, Europa's sea is too deep and dark, and 'clean' people find it hard to go far..."
Override.entitydescription.tsm_gybq: Another outcome of Sea of Miracles's development of Same Twilight: a designated marksman rifle that can only fire in semi-automatic mode. Its unique structure not only delivers powerful rounds but also increases recoil and ammunition consumption, reducing rate of fire, and special stocks offer little improvement. If misused, it could even harm the shooter; only experienced soldiers can use it flexibly and efficiently to eliminate enemies. Using ‖color:150,0,0,255‖Sea of Miracles ammunition‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.tsm_xylz: A large-caliber anti-material weapon developed by Sea of Miracles at any cost. The ammunition used possesses tremendous lethality, making it unmanageable for shooters without extensive specialized training. As a result, this weapon is in very limited supply and costly to produce.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_gravitythrower:
We bring change to this world, executing judgment in the land of the gods
 Sea of Miracles's latest developed gravity weapon, the Judgment-Bringer
 Each use requires wearing specific protective gear; otherwise, there will be severe consequences.
 Ammunition ‖color:150,0,0,255‖Zero Gravity Traction Laser Beam‖color:end‖ can only be purchased at designated sites.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_201: Utilizes modern design principles, focusing on ergonomics and combat performance. Its moderate length makes it easy to carry and operate, while the empty weight is effectively controlled to reduce soldiers' burden. The canvas belt-fed system allows for rapid ammunition replenishment, ensuring sustained firepower and improving combat efficiency. It can use both ‖color:150,0,0,255‖Canvas Ammo Bags‖color:end‖ and ‖color:150,0,0,255‖5.8mm Rifle Magazines‖color:end‖, further expanding battlefield adaptability.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_advanced_95: Achieves advanced performance comparable to similar weapons, enabling infantry squads to engage both point and area targets while being effective against light armor. It can be equipped with extended lighting devices or grenade launchers, using ‖color:150,0,0,255‖5.8mm ammunition‖color:end‖.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_advanced_03: This rifle features a longer automatic mechanism guide rail, increasing the recoil buffer. It uses a temperature-controlled forged aluminum upper and lower receiver, with the upper receiver directly compatible with Type 03 specialized sights. The lower receiver and other parts are made of titanium-aluminum alloy. The left and right side plates, grip, and stock are constructed from high-strength, high-temperature-resistant engineering plastics, with a hollow section for accessory tubes, using ‖color:150,0,0,255‖5.8mm ammunition‖color:end‖.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_qbz_191: After engaging in various combat scenarios, the exceptional performance and fully modular design of the QBZ-191, utilizing ‖color:150,0,0,255‖5.8mm‖color:end‖ magazines, has come to fruition. Its high versatility and balanced cost fully meet service standards, crafted from innovative materials and battle-tested experience.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_advanced_191: A designated marksman rifle derived from the QBZ-191, utilizing ‖color:150,0,0,255‖5.8mm‖color:end‖ ammunition. The longer barrel provides greater recoil space, improving control and achieving sniper-level accuracy, making it suitable for special barrels and scopes.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_ots11: A weapon born from the “Ideal Individual Combat Weapon” program, lightweight and featuring an all-in-one design, including a grenade launcher (note: magazines and grenades cannot be used simultaneously, as it may cause a catastrophic failure), advanced electro-optical thermal imaging sights, and utilizing existing ‖color:150,0,0,255‖5.8mm‖color:end‖ assault rifle magazines. However, due to its exorbitant cost, it was never put into service, with only a few prototypes circulating.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_gm6: A highly precise and compact large-caliber sniper rifle. The floating barrel and bullpup design make it very handy even in indoor combat. Its manufacturing blueprints are highly classified; even if they fall into enemy hands, reverse engineering is impossible. Only elite forces can equip it, using ‖color:150,0,0,255‖12.7*108mm‖color:end‖ and ‖color:150,0,0,255‖12.7*99‖color:end‖ caliber sniper ammunition.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_qbs: A semi-auto shotgun with remarkable reliability and adaptability, no matter if it's silt-filled ocean depths or cramped outposts, though the gun is short, its chamber pressure is enough to sweep through enemies.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_krmagazine: Can hold 60 rounds of standard ammunition, with a special design ensuring reliability, but the price is not guaranteed.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_magazinebg: Triton magazine developed by Sea of Miracles, featuring more powerful ammunition types; take care not to cause friendly fire. Only select squads have permission to use this ammunition.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_magazinecj: Contains 30 rounds of standard armor-piercing ammunition, effectively countering the swift onslaught of mud golems in the ship's cabin. The magazine is marked for armor-piercing rounds for easy identification.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_ammobox: Sea of Miracles Ammunition Box [Insert magazine, right-click + left-click to load.]
Override.entitydescription.tsm_weightless_tractio: Expensive custom shell containing gravity fluid undergoing intense reactions; each use creates a gravity field.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_xymagazine: Holds 5 rounds. Even though the capacity of a single magazine is pitifully low, it still doesn't reduce its size in the slightest.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_xymagazine_bg: Holds 5 rounds of special ammunition, delivering tremendous power and extreme lethality.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_58_mag: Holds 30 rounds of 5.8mm ammunition, can be loaded using Sea of Miracles ammunition boxes.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_58_mag_cj: Holds 30 rounds of 5.8mm armor-piercing ammunition, can be loaded using Sea of Miracles ammunition boxes.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_58_201mag: Holds 100 rounds of 5.8mm caliber ammunition, using a dispersible ammo belt internally, but stored in canvas allows for compact size, easy carrying, and light weight; can be loaded using Sea of Miracles ammunition boxes.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_58_201cjmag: Holds 100 rounds of 5.8mm armor-piercing ammunition, can be loaded using Sea of Miracles ammunition boxes.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_l85a2: Once considered the world's worst assault rifle, due to issues like incompatible magazine wells and frequent jams, "the world's best spear that occasionally shoots bullets," yet the improved version is acceptable as a foundational bullpup product. Uses Coalition-issued ‖color:150,0,0,255‖5.56mm‖color:end‖ magazines.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_famas: The efficient operation of the delayed locking lever mechanism gives the FAMAS the most aggressive firing speed among rifles, but the downside is obvious: its excessive rate of fire leads to extremely poor endurance, thus it features a three-round burst selector. Uses Coalition-issued ‖color:150,0,0,255‖5.56mm‖color:end‖ magazines.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_aug: Coalition standard assault rifle, modernized to adapt to various tactical accessories. Uses Coalition-issued ‖color:150,0,0,255‖5.56mm‖color:end‖ magazines.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_tavor21: A stable and reliable bullpup rifle, featuring comprehensive modularity. However, its high cost and lack of outstanding advantages prevented its adoption by the Coalition, instead serving as a transitional product for advanced bullpup rifles. Uses Coalition-issued ‖color:150,0,0,255‖5.56mm‖color:end‖ magazines.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_mdr: In increasingly harsh combat scenarios, the Coalition found its small-caliber ammunition increasingly inadequate. The MDR was introduced as a response, maintaining a length of 79cm while using a 5.56mm configuration; it can switch to a 7.62mm configuration, allowing for quick conversion to engage targets while maintaining stability and versatility. Using ‖color:150,0,0,255‖5.56mm‖color:end‖ or ‖color:150,0,0,255‖7.62mm‖color:end‖ magazines.
Override.entityname.tsm_lm_mdr_c: Coalition MDR Bullpup Combat Rifle - Infiltration Type
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_mdr_c: This rifle is a special modification for the Coalition's decapitation operations, equipped with a custom suppressor for better infiltration. It uses ‖color:150,0,0,255‖7.62x51mm‖color:end‖ ammunition.
Override.entityname.tsm_lm_vsh2: Coalition VHS-2 "Rogue" Advanced Bullpup Combat Rifle
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_vsh2: The ideal bullpup rifle, integrating a series of predecessor advantages. Its high rate of fire and accuracy have made the "Rogue" famous. The fully modernized modules and extensive use of engineering plastics make it lightweight, versatile, and visually appealing, earning high praise from various frontline units. It uses Coalition-issued ‖color:150,0,0,255‖5.56mm‖color:end‖ magazines.
Override.entityname.tsm_lm_rm277: Coalition RM277 Special Bullpup Combat Rifle
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_rm277: Undoubtedly a revolutionary product. It combines cutting-edge technology from general dynamics and future weapon systems, boasting dual advantages in firepower and accuracy. This rifle uses a unique ‖color:150,0,0,255‖6.8x51‖color:end‖ caliber magazine, demonstrating real and astonishing accuracy and armor-penetrating capability on the battlefield. The specially designed suppressor not only extends the lifespan of the barrel but also reduces flash and sound levels to a very low level.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_m16: A reliable assault rifle that can take down enemies rushing towards you, even if you have no experience with weapons. Uses the Coalition-issued ‖color:150,0,0,255‖5.56mm‖color:end‖ magazine.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_m16a4: A fully improved model based on the M16A1, it becomes a fully modular platform. Its longer barrel gives it superior penetration among rifles, yet retains the three-round burst firing mode of the A1 version. The lack of suppressive fire was quickly replaced by the M4 carbine. Uses the Coalition-issued ‖color:150,0,0,255‖5.56mm‖color:end‖ magazine.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_m110: Utilizing a gas-operated semi-automatic firing system, it boasts a higher rate of fire than manually operated bolt-action sniper rifles. It features a 150mm long muzzle attachment to reduce noise and muzzle flash. It has become the preferred choice for Coalition counter-terrorism operations and can be fitted with a bipod for better stability. Uses the Coalition-issued ‖color:150,0,0,255‖7.62x51mm‖color:end‖ caliber magazine.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_ar15: Once the best-selling rifle on Earth, its stability and accuracy, combined with its affordable price and high modularity, make it popular among the public for defending their rights. The military version in the Coalition already features full-auto capability. Uses the Coalition-issued ‖color:150,0,0,255‖5.56mm‖color:end‖ magazine.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_M4: An older carbine that does not use the banned 6.8mm ammunition. However, its excellent design keeps it as the most widely used weapon in the Coalition today, using the Coalition-issued ‖color:150,0,0,255‖5.56mm‖color:end‖ magazine.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_hk416: using the Coalition-issued ‖color:150,0,0,255‖5.56mm‖color:end‖ magazine, HK416 Assault Rifle as a high-capability tactical equipment, became an indispensable weapon for crews in dangerous abyssal environments. It not only fulfills the combat needs of deep sea colonizers with its remarkable reliability and wide functionality, it is also the mainstay of hope against unknown threats in the dark and terrifying environments.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_scarh: The Coalition's standard 5.56*45 caliber ammo has shown insufficient penetration against the ever improving bullet vests, and to complete complex and diverse missions, the coalition's special forces proposes a higher standard to long-range penetration, so this Heavy Battle Rifle came to be. Uses ‖color:150,0,0,255‖7.62*51mm‖color:end‖ ammo.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_mk18: With a shorter body than the Coalition carbine, it offers greater maneuverability. Its powerful explosive force made it a standard assault rifle for the Coalition. Uses the Coalition-issued ‖color:150,0,0,255‖5.56mm‖color:end‖ magazine.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_mcx: Experimental advanced weapon planned for special forces of the Coalition, regarded as the pinnacle of AR rifles, using the experimental ‖color:150,0,0,255‖6.8x51mm‖color:end‖ magazine, it possesses considerable lethality, equipped with a fully modernized modular platform.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_hk417: Using ‖color:150,0,0,255‖7.62*51‖color:end‖ caliber magazines, capable of single shot sniping, or suppressive fire, The modularity of the AR structure makes it fit for any kind of mission, but only the best of soldiers could handle its full-auto recoil.
Override.entityname.tsm_lm_mk14ebr: Coalition MK14 EBR Battle Marksman Rifle
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_mk14ebr: Uses ‖color:150,0,0,255‖7.62*51‖color:end‖ caliber magazines, when bolt-action sniper rifles lack in suppression, and DMRs lack in power, this precise yet suppressive battle marksman rifle could clear the path.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_spg1: Uses ‖color:150,0,0,255‖Coalition magazine(7.62*51)‖color:end‖, with outstanding precision and mediocre power, especially fit for counter-terrorist operations.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_awm: Uses ‖color:150,0,0,255‖Sniper rifle magazine(8.6*70)‖color:end‖, the Coalition's most common sniper rifle, often seen in outpost counter-terrorist operations, the simple structure and comfortable handling makes even less-experienced snipers able to complete the mission.
Override.entityname.tsm_lm_m82a1: Coalition Barrett M82A1 Anti-Materiel Sniper Rifle
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_m82a1: Uses ‖color:150,0,0,255‖Sniper rifle magazine(12.7*99)‖color:end‖, an anti-material sniper rifle that has served the Coalition for years, able to penetrate submarine hulls to decapitate high-value targets inside the submarine, but you need to be strong enough to handle this bad boy.
Override.entityname.tsm_honeybadger: Coalition Honey Badger Short Assault Rifle
Override.entitydescription.tsm_honeybadger: Submachine Guns have been proven to be maneuverable but ineffective in close range fights against targets with armor. After consideration of ammo compatability, the Honey Badger short assault rifle was born, using ‖color:150,0,0,255‖.300BLK Magazine‖color:end‖, with a built-in silencer, small size, big caliber, having both the advantages of SMGs and ARs.
Override.entityname.tsm_lm_czbren3: Coalition CZ BREN3 Special Forces Short Assault Rifle
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_czbren3: Uses ‖color:150,0,0,255‖.300BLK Magazine‖color:end‖,the built-in silencer and state-of-the-art material makes it elegant yet deadly, appearing in all kinds of secret missions, more lethal than an SMG, and more maneuverable than an AR.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_mcxxws: Uses ‖color:150,0,0,255‖.300BLK Magazine‖color:end‖, the most compact AR yet, when the stock and the handgaurd are folded, it is small enough to carry in pockets, more maneuverable than an AR, more lethal than an SMG, like a rattlesnake waiting to ambush its prey.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_mk18_l: A modified MK18, more suitable for quick response units in indoor combat. Uses the Coalition-issued ‖color:150,0,0,255‖5.56mm‖color:end‖ magazine.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_g36c: As the main assault weapon in Coalition raids, "short" and "light" are its biggest features, yet the recoil doesn't increase thanks to its ergonomics, well-praised by many outpost security officers. Uses Coalition-issued ‖color:150,0,0,255‖5.56mm‖color:end‖ magazines, unable to load drum magazines.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_mk18_c: A camouflage MK18 that has been equipped with a scope and grip for improved control, allowing the shooter to fire without awkwardly gripping a poorly designed forend. Uses the Coalition-issued ‖color:150,0,0,255‖5.56mm‖color:end‖ magazine.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_g36ka4: The Standard evolution of the short version, stronger firepower at the cost of being longer and clumsier.Uses Coalition-issued ‖color:150,0,0,255‖5.56mm‖color:end‖ magazines, unable to load drum magazines.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_hk433: Uses ‖color:150,0,0,255‖5.56‖color:end‖caliber ammo or ‖color:150,0,0,255‖.300blk Magazine‖color:end‖,Based on a brand-new, unique, expandable, and efficient weapon platform, the future standard weapon of armies and security officers, unfortunately not equipped due to high manufacturing costs, some officers would buy this beautiful weapon even at their own expense.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_97: A new bullpup rifle modified at the request of certain Coalition units, adapted to use ‖color:150,0,0,255‖5.56mm‖color:end‖ ammunition, and employs a short burst mechanism to achieve fast suppression and accuracy.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_drh: An assault rifle using ‖color:150,0,0,255‖6.8mm‖color:end‖ military ammunition, it has a high rate of fire and considerable power. However, the significant recoil from the 6.5mm ammunition requires extensive training to master. Can be fitted with optics.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_m4_c: A specially modified assault rifle, equipped with a scope and a shotgun underbarrel on a camouflage M4. While easy to use, it cannot simultaneously fire 5.56 bullets and shotgun rounds due to excessive recoil that could injure the shooter. Uses the Coalition-issued ‖color:150,0,0,255‖5.56mm‖color:end‖ magazine.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_cz805a1: A unused standard weapon of the Coalition, but certainly a remarkable one, beautiful structure, folding stock and use of engineering plastic makes the weight more comfortable, uses the Coalition-issued ‖color:150,0,0,255‖5.56mm‖color:end‖ magazine.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_cz806: easier operation with underbarrel grenade launher, many mercenaries would get one if their budget allows, uses the Coalition-issued ‖color:150,0,0,255‖5.56mm‖color:end‖ magazine.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_dp12: A fearsome double-barreled beast, enemies are knocked into the wall the second they see it, provides a huge advantage to teams with the initiative, and give space for teammates in the back, the favorite of many vanguards.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_ks23: Using the ‖color:150,0,0,255‖4 Gauge Shotgun Shell‖color:end‖ banned by the Europa Convention, this gun itself is also banned. Having a terrifying 23mm caliber, you only need to saw off a cannon barrel, and use three 12 gauge shotgun shell to fabricate it. Remember, no war changes because of a humanitarian treaty.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_spas12: An old versatile shotgun, able to switch between pump-action and semi-auto firing, resulting in a higher fire rate than most shotguns, most problems could be solved with just a few shots.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_ash12: The Beowulf squadron have reported on multiple occasions, separatists being able to fight back even after shot multiple times with conventional caliber rifles, until they eventually bleed to death. Though this has never been confirmed by the Coalition, they still agreed to equip the Beowulf squadron with some ‖color:0,200,0,255‖12.7*55‖color:end‖ caliber assault rifle, of course, its full-auto recoil is something only true men can handle.
Override.entityname.tsm_lm_mk46: Coalition General Purpose Light Machine Gun (MK46)
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_mk46: A squad light machine gun from Earth, with a shorter barrel making it more suitable for maneuvering in narrow station spaces or submarine corridors, using ‖color:150,0,0,255‖Coalition light machine gun magazines (5.56x45mm)‖color:end‖.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_m249: While its lethality is somewhat lacking, it offers reliability and strong firepower with a 200-round belt feed, making it the most enduring weapon for sustained fire in infantry squads. A bipod can be installed to provide some stability, using ‖color:150,0,0,255‖Coalition light machine gun magazines (5.56x45mm)‖color:end‖.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_m240b: Extremely heavy due to the full steel body, to provide terrifying suppressive power, uses ‖color:150,0,0,255‖Coalition Machine Gun Magazine(7.62*51)‖color:end‖.
Override.entityname.tsm_lm_m60e6: Coalition General Purpose Machine Gun(MM60 E6)
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_m60e6: Uses ‖color:150,0,0,255‖Coalition Machine Gun Magazine(7.62*51)‖color:end‖, due to prior general purpose machine guns being too large and heavy in a cramped submarine, the Coalition needs a shorter, more modular general purpose machine gun with better ergonomics, and this is the perfect answer.
Override.entityname.tsm_lm_xm250: Coalition XM250 Prototype Squad Machine Gun
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_xm250: Uses a 150 round ‖color:150,0,0,255‖Coalition Machine Gun Ammo Bag(6.8*51)‖color:end‖, with new ammo and material, muzzle velocity almost twice the standard machine guns of the coalition, it could easily pierce any bulletproof vests and helmets, smaller ammo size to increase bag capacity, floating gun barrel and great ergonomics for better recoil control.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_m1014: A combat shotgun from centuries ago, it remains the top choice for security and self-defense in the oceans of Europa after design optimization.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_minigun: A portable Gatling gun that can knock back inexperienced shooters even when using the same ammunition as assault rifles. Be careful not to hold the trigger down too long, as this could lead to uncontrolled fire and possibly hit your teammates.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_ksg: Short but capable of holding 9 rounds, which is a significant advantage in the cramped quarters of a Europa cabin. This means you can continue firing when monsters rush at you— and you won't easily lose your weapon to enemies. The double-trigger mechanism allows for a powerful burst of fire in a very short time.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_m700: The Coalition has upgraded older bolt-action rifles to fire more powerful ammunition. However, correspondingly, if you want to keep your shoulder intact, you should practice well before using it. Uses the Coalition-issued ‖color:150,0,0,255‖.338 caliber‖color:end‖ ammunition.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_lm_m700_r: Featuring a longer barrel and higher precision, it can only be placed on a weapon rack due to its excessive length. Coalition snipers take pride in their ability to handle this M700. Uses ‖color:150,0,0,255‖.338 caliber‖color:end‖ ammunition.
Override.entitydescription.lm_ammobox: Coalition-issued ammo box, can load common Coalition magazines [Insert magazine, right-click + left-click to load.]
Override.entityname.tsm_556_45_mgmag_cj: Coalition Light Machine Gun Armor-Piercing Magazine (5.56*45mm)
Override.entityname.lm_762_51_mgmag_cj: Coalition Squad Machine Gun Armor-Piercing Magazine (7.62*51mm)
Override.entityname.lm_68_51ap_mgmag: Coalition Machine Gun Armor-Piercing Ammo Bag(6.8*51)
Override.entitydescription.lm_68_51ap_mgmag: Loaded with 150 rounds of 6.8*51mm armor-piercing ammo.
Override.entitydescription.lm_556_mag: Contains a magazine loaded with 33 standard rounds, with a large quantity.
Override.entitydescription.lm_556cj_mag: Holds 31 armor-piercing rounds that can effectively deal with armored creatures and bulletproof vests, but for some reason, the label on the magazine states it contains 33 rounds? The lower count suggests it's not advisable to carry too many.
Override.entitydescription.lm_556gb_mag: Contains 30 rounds of precious high-explosive ammunition for military use within the Coalition, capable of efficiently neutralizing targets. Limited quantity, not advisable to carry too many at once.
Override.entitydescription.lm_556kr_mag: Loaded with 45 rounds of standard ammo
Override.entitydescription.lm_556kr_drum: Loaded with 60 rounds of standard ammo
Override.entitydescription.lm_65_magazine: Holds 30 rounds of standard 6.5x55mm ammunition with some armor-piercing capability for dealing with armored targets.
Override.entitydescription.lm_762_35_mag: Contains 30 round of .300 caliber ammo, a type of silent yet deadly subsonic ammo, different from standard supersonic ammo, its slower speed makes it lodge into the target's body and not pass through, resulting in higher stopping power, at the expense of lower penetration against armored targets, its advantages are fully utilized in riot control or hunting missions.
Override.entitydescription.lm_65kj_magazine: Holds 30 rounds of hollow point ammunition designed to target unarmored foes, causing substantial bleeding upon impact.
Override.entitydescription.lm_68_51kj_magazine: Holds 30 rounds of Open Tip Match 6.8x51mm ammunition.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_miniammo: 200 rounds of 5.56 caliber ammunition, fire away.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_fkj_tac9: Uses ‖color:150,0,0,255‖9mm‖color:end‖ pistol magazine, easily manufactured with a stamping press, cheap to make, easy to conceal, the deadly threat of full-auto firepower makes it the favorite of many gangsters, though it is lackluster in full-fledged military conflicts.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_fkj_uzi: Uses ‖color:150,0,0,255‖9mm‖color:end‖ pistol magazine, a high fire rate gives it outstanding firepower, though it is ineffective against armored targets and nasty spread. For transport personnel or shield users, one free hand could also be very lethal.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_fkj_ppk20: Uses ‖color:150,0,0,255‖Submachine Gun Magazine(9mm)‖color:end‖, rebel logistics units have disused old submachine guns, and switched to this new submachine gun, making them capable of posing a threat even with minimal weapons training, gun barrel slot is only compatible with a silencer.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_fkj_evo3: Uses ‖color:150,0,0,255‖Submachine Gun Magazine(9mm)‖color:end‖, when its stock is folded, it looks like a scorpion ready to pounce, lethal yet elegant, full modularization and compatibility with pistol silencers, a favorite symbol of position for rebel officers, gun barrel slot is only compatible with a silencer.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_fkj_an94: A relic from a once-existing country, inherited by the Separatists and brought to new heights. The Separatists not only increased its caliber to ‖color:150,0,0,255‖7.62x39mm‖color:end‖ but also retained its accuracy. However, it requires extensive training to use it properly. (The weapon's durability getting stuck at 50% after firing is normal, a necessary sacrifice for the recoil mechanism.)
Override.entitydescription.tsm_fkj_ak74: Can be properly used after only half an hour of learning, the perfect weapon for a seven-year-old. Fires ‖color:150,0,0,255‖5.45x39mm‖color:end‖ rounds.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_fkj_ak74u: Fires ‖color:150,0,0,255‖5.45*39‖color:end‖ ammo, folding stock makes transportation easier, gun muzzle is also further back, cheap to manufacture, brown engineering plastic for earth nostalgia, an ideal self-defense weapon for logistic units.
Override.entityname.tsm_fkj_groza: Rebel OTS Groza-1 “Lightning” Bullpup Assault Rifle
Override.entitydescription.tsm_fkj_groza: A short bullpup rifle modified from the AK74U, using a ‖color:150,0,0,255‖9*39mm‖color:end‖ caliber magazine. Despite its powerful large caliber and impressive fire rate, its poor ergonomics and uncontrollable recoil quickly led to it being phased out in submarine warfare, but its low cost and portability made it popular among pirates and Separatists.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_fkj_ak103: An excellent weapon, perfect for resisting Union tyranny. Many times, all you need to do is grab the gun and unload on the Union. Fires ‖color:150,0,0,255‖7.62x39mm‖color:end‖ rounds.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_fkj_ak103_l: Lightened and improved firing rate, making it better suited for submarine combat. Fires ‖color:150,0,0,255‖7.62x39mm‖color:end‖ rounds.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_fkj_ak105: The shorter barrel makes it more suitable for use in confined spaces, ideal for submariners during close-quarters retaliation or dock raids. Fires ‖color:150,0,0,255‖5.45x39mm‖color:end‖ rounds.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_fkj_ak105_l: A lighter AK-105, with no other improvements. Since the stock has been replaced, remember to bring firearm cleaning tools. Fires ‖color:150,0,0,255‖5.45x39mm‖color:end‖ rounds.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_fkj_am17: Made for more covert missions of the rebels, equipped with a custom silencer, but due to the smaller caliber, it is only used by some squads. Fires ‖color:150,0,0,255‖5.45*39‖color:end‖Ammo.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_fkj_sks: A former weapon of the socialist bloc, but modified by the petty bourgeoisie. While it's more user-friendly, something just feels off? Uses ‖color:150,0,0,255‖7.62x39mm‖color:end‖ magazines.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_fkj_ak12: A "new" weapon with a century of history, modified by the Separatists with an adaptive barrel and chamber to fire both ‖color:150,0,0,255‖5.45x39mm‖color:end‖ and ‖color:150,0,0,255‖7.62x39mm‖color:end‖ calibers.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_fkj_aa12: A powerhouse in the cabin, a meat grinder in close quarters. Just hold down the trigger and nothing, man or beast, in front of you will survive. Uses ‖color:150,0,0,255‖Rebel Shotgun Drum‖color:end‖ for ammunition.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_fkj_svd: A semi-automatic precision rifle that allows a trained sniper to quickly pick off barricaded enemies from an elevated position.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_fkj_jts: A powerful weapon that allows rebel fighters to suppress Union dogs, pinning them down, before ripping them and their cover to shreds. The recoil from continuous fire can even push the shooter backward, so it's advised to be trained before using this weapon. Uses ‖color:150,0,0,255‖Rebel General-Purpose Machine Gun Magazine (5.45x39mm)‖color:end‖.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_fkj_pkp: A modernized improvement of what's considered the world's best general-purpose machine gun, still formidable even on Europa. The name "Pecheneg" comes from the Pechenegs, a belligerent Western Turkic branch from Earth's steppes. Effective within range against light structures and basic cover. Now modified by the Separatists to use ‖color:150,0,0,255‖Rebel Machine Gun Magazine (7.62x54)‖color:end‖.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_fkj_saw: Looks like a chainsaw broken down and then assembled together, a terrifying appearance, its rapid firing sounds also resemble a lethal chainsaw. Uses‖color:150,0,0,255‖Rebel General Purpose Machine Gun Magazine(5.45*39)‖color:end‖.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_fkj_jq430: Features a faux-wood stock and foregrip, letting users feel the breath of Earth, while its grenade launcher can give enemies a taste of Europa's shockwaves (Note: Do not use both the magazine and grenade at the same time, as it may cause a barrel explosion). However, the bayonet at the muzzle is so difficult to use that almost no one can wield it. Fires ‖color:150,0,0,255‖7.62x39mm‖color:end‖ rounds.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_fkj_ak12_c: Equipped with a foregrip for better control. Can also fire both ‖color:150,0,0,255‖5.45x39mm‖color:end‖ and ‖color:150,0,0,255‖7.62x39mm‖color:end‖ rounds.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_fkj_561a: An modernized version of an old weapon, sold by some mysterious faction through black markets to the rebels, became one of their most advanced weapons. Fires‖color:150,0,0,255‖5.45*39‖color:end‖ or ‖color:150,0,0,255‖7.62*39‖color:end‖ ammo.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_fkj_ak105_c: Equipped with an under-barrel grenade launcher, capable of firing grenades without the need for a separate launcher (Note: Do not use both the magazine and grenade at the same time, as it may cause a barrel explosion). Fires ‖color:150,0,0,255‖5.45x39mm‖color:end‖ rounds.
Override.entityname.tsm_fkj_m2: M2 Browning Heavy Machine Gun (Portable Version)
Override.entitydescription.tsm_fkj_m2: Hey! it's a machinegun!\nUses ‖color:150,0,0,255‖Rebel Heavy Machine Gun Magazine‖color:end‖.
Override.entityname.tsm_fkj_m2_eagle: M2 Browning Heavy Machine Gun (White Eagle Paint)
Override.entitydescription.tsm_fkj_m2_eagle: To the brothers sharing the same boat
Override.entitydescription.tsm_fkj_rpk16: Not only does it continue the excellent tradition of the AK family, but it has also undergone comprehensive modernization. Its lightweight and high firepower have made it extremely effective in submarine warfare, using ‖color:150,0,0,255‖5.45x39mm‖color:end‖ Rebel Magazine or ‖color:150,0,0,255‖RPK Drum‖color:end‖.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_fkj_ace52: As the AK series rifles became more common in the separatist forces, using mid-powered rounds, the full-powered Galil firing ‖color:150,0,0,255‖7.62x51mm‖color:end‖ still held its place. When the AK can't pierce enemy armor, the ACE52 might be the better choice.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_fkj_g3a4: Uses a ‖color:150,0,0,255‖7.62x51mm‖color:end‖ caliber magazine. The retractable stock reduces the weapon's weight, and though it has a slower rate of fire, what fighter could resist the super cool charging handle of the G3?
Override.entitydescription.tsm_fkj_fal: Uses a ‖color:150,0,0,255‖7.62x51mm‖color:end‖ caliber magazine. Known as the "Right Arm of the Free World," it is praised as the best full-power rifle platform. Low-cost, high burst power, making it beloved by many underworld heroes.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_fkj_sg553: Uses a ‖color:150,0,0,255‖7.62*51mm‖color:end‖ caliber magazine, modified from the now outdated small-caliber SG550, making it more suitable for conquest and raids.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_fkj_sr3m: Specially designed by the rebels for political bodyguard squads or special forces in need of a concealable assault weapon, its size, weight, and role in battle is similar to a submachine gun, but due to it using ‖9*39‖color:end‖ Heavy Special Forces Magazine, it is defined as an assault rifle instead.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_fkj_9a91: One of the smallest assault rifles, uses ‖color:0,200,0,255‖9*39‖color:end‖ Heavy Special Forces Magazine, able to adapt to more rapid assault missions. The short weapon has high stability and mobility, has a built-in OPK-7 optic.
Override.entityname.tsm_fkj_vss: Rebel VSS Special Forces Sniper Rifle
