Override.entitydescription.tsm_fkj_vss: The top choice used by rebel elites for scouting and assassinations, uses ‖color:0,200,0,255‖9*39‖color:end‖ Heavy Special Forces Magazine, able to penetrate Kevlar vests even after lowering bullet speed. Equipped with a built-in silencer.
Override.entityname.tsm_fkj_asval: Rebel AS-Val “Shaft” Special Forces Assault Rifle
Override.entitydescription.tsm_fkj_asval: Uses ‖color:0,200,0,255‖9*39‖color:end‖ Heavy Special Forces Magazine, the high fire rate compensates for the lack of close range suppression of this weapon series, mostly used against personnel and soft targets, rumored to be able to penetrate 5mm thick steel plates.
Override.entitydescription.fkj_ammobox: Ammunition box with a semi-automatic reloading mechanism, containing ammunition used by Separatist standard-issue weapons. 「Insert an empty magazine, left-click + right-click to reload the magazine.」
Override.entitydescription.fkj_545_mag: A 35-round extended magazine for 5.45 ammo, mass-produced, and users are accustomed to carrying extra magazines.
Override.entitydescription.fkj_545_krmag: A drum magazine holding 70 rounds of 5.45 ammo, offering excellent sustainability.
Override.entitydescription.fkj_545cj_mag: A 33-round magazine loaded with 5.45 armor-piercing rounds, effective against body armor and biological shells.
Override.entitydescription.fkj_545hz_mag: Loaded with 30 rounds of new high-explosive bullets, though somewhat rare.
Override.entitydescription.fkj_762_krmag: A drum magazine holding 60 rounds of 7.62 ammo, capable of giving an assault rifle machine-gun-like firepower.
Override.entitydescription.fkj_762cj_mag: The standard magazine's regular ammo has been replaced with 30 rounds of 7.62 armor-piercing rounds. You won't need to worry about piercing body armor anymore!
Override.entitydescription.fkj_762hz_mag: Loaded with 30 rounds of 7.62x39mm caliber explosive bullets.
Override.entitydescription.fkj_762_51_ap_mag: Holds 20 rounds of 7.62x51mm caliber armor-piercing rounds.
Override.entitydescription.fkj_jts_mag: A box holding a 200-round belt of 5.45x39mm ammo, allowing the shooter to waste as much ammo as they like.
Override.entityname.fkj_jts_cjmag: Rebel General-Purpose Machine Gun Armor-Piercing Magazine (5.45*39mm)
Override.entitydescription.fkj_jts_cjmag: A box holding a 200-round belt of 5.45x39mm armor-piercing rounds.
Override.entityname.fkj_pkp_mag_cj: Rebel General-Purpose Machine Gun Armor-Piercing Magazine (7.62*54)
Override.entitydescription.fkj_pkp_mag_cj: A box holding a 100-round belt armor-piercing rounds.
Override.entitydescription.fkj_m2_mag: A box of 150 rounds mounted on a heavy machine gun, providing prolonged fire. Too large to be portable, it's recommended to have an assistant gunner carry it.
Override.entitydescription.fkj_svd_mag: A magazine holding 20 rifle rounds. Due to its size, shooters tend not to carry too many at once.
Override.entitydescription.fkj_aa12_mag: A drum holding 18 shotgun shells, providing the AA-12 with extended sustainability.
Override.entitydescription.fkj_rpk_mag: A drum holding 95 rounds of 5.45x39mm caliber ammo, offering the RPK long-term sustainability.
Override.entitydescription.fkj_9_39_ap_mage: Holds 20 rounds of 9*39mm caliber armor-piercing rounds
Override.entitydescription.fkj_9_39_krap_mag: Holds 30 rounds of 9*39mm caliber armor-piercing rounds
Override.entitydescription.tsm_m32_launcher: A revolving grenade launcher capable of firing various types of ammunition. Whether for suppressing riots and uprisings or resisting packs of Mudraptors, it's a highly efficient, ferocious weapon.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_rpg: This oversized rocket launcher is equipped with a series of new accessories to help the shooter grip and aim. More dangerous and deadly for everyone involved—make sure to follow proper usage guidelines!
Override.entitydescription.tsm_bazooka: An antique, with blueprints from a collector's vault. The shell is isolated from the shooter, making it safer, though improper use can still cause harm.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_r_thermobaric: The oversized warhead drastically reduces portability. Filled with fuel-air explosives, one shot is enough to consume the oxygen in a large space while causing severe burns. A perfect choice for dealing with entrenched enemies.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_r_aix: Nicknamed "The Pencil" due to its shape, but this pencil is far deadlier than the one John Wick uses—both to the target and the shooter.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_r_heat: A classic model, no further explanation needed.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_b_rocket: An antique x2mm. Modern craftsmanship still can't improve this relic much, but its size gives it better portability.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_grenade_heat: A fast-flying grenade? Crude but accurate. It works just like that.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_grenade_fire: Creates a stable field of high-temperature flames upon explosion, consuming oxygen and life while igniting nearby flammable objects.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_p90: This gun, despite being a submachine gun, boasts excellent penetration capability, maintaining decent penetration power against high-level body armor within effective range. It is dubbed the “Body Armor Puncher” and utilizes a simple and reliable operational mechanism while having good shooting accuracy. In the cramped environments of submarines, its short bullpup design and penetration power quickly gained popularity among various factions on Europa, using ‖color:150,0,0,255‖5.7x28mm Rounds‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.tsm_mp7: MP7 uses‖color:150,0,0,255‖4.6×30‖color:end‖ caliber ammo, with the start of total war, the number of logistics, maintenance and support units has substantially increased, and these non-combatants require weapons that are light, easy to operate and carry, and effective against the quickly improving armor. High-powered self-defense weapons replaced submachine guns and pistols, so the MP7 makes its debut again, gun barrel slot is only compatible with silencers.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_ump45: Uses ‖color:150,0,0,255‖.45‖color:end‖ submachine gun ammo. UMP45 uses blowback action and open bolt to improve firing accuracy. The action awaits firing at the front of the gun barrel. In contrast with most submachine guns with the action positioned behind, this structure could increase accuracy and agility of the trigger. Gun barrel slot is only compatible with silencers.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_92_pistols: An excellent individual defense weapon with low maintenance costs, suitable for engaging unarmored or lightly armored infantry targets, using ‖color:150,0,0,255‖9mm Pistol Magazine‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.tsm_fn509_pistols: The FN 509 Tactical features a modern appearance and design with clear lines and a smooth surface. Its grip is covered with a special texture for better stability during use. Uses ‖color:150,0,0,255‖9mm Pistol Magazine‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.tsm_1911_pistols: This classic weapon also requires targeted modifications. Adapted to the Europa environment, this firearm quickly became favored by law enforcement and vigilante justice seekers. Uses ‖color:150,0,0,255‖.45 Caliber‖color:end‖ Rounds
Override.entitydescription.tsm_glock18_pistols: The Glock 18 is a 9mm caliber pistol known for its reliability and high rate of fire. Due to its considerable power, its production is restricted, and it is only provided to special forces. Uses ‖color:150,0,0,255‖9mm Pistol Magazine‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.tsm_de_handgun: Once the large-caliber hunting pistol on Earth, it is striking in appearance and powerful, remaining a formidable weapon even on Europa. However, shooters require specialized training to handle it properly—nobody wants the gun to fly back at their face when fired, right? Uses ‖color:150,0,0,255‖.50 Caliber‖color:end‖ Rounds
Override.entitydescription.tsm_88: This rifle is equipped with a 4x or 6x optical scope to enhance target recognition and strike capability. However, it uses ‖color:150,0,0,255‖5.8mm‖color:end‖ Rounds, which are relatively heavy and significantly affect the sniper rifle's accuracy. Additionally, the connection method between the barrel and bipod differs from standard sniper rifles, also impacting shooting precision. Uses ‖color:150,0,0,255‖5.8mm Sniper Rifle Magazine‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.tsm_cslr4: The CS/LR4 model ‖color:150,0,0,255‖7.62mm‖color:end‖ high-precision sniper rifle features a bullpup structure, a floating barrel design, a rotating bolt action, and magazine feeding. The rifle consists of a body, stock/handguard, action, feeding device, and bipod. It also includes an 8x-32x white light scope, night vision enhancement device, laser rangefinder/ballistic computer, maintenance tools, spare magazines, and other accessories. The complete system is priced at 260,000 excluding ammunition. Uses ‖color:150,0,0,255‖7.62mm Sniper Rifle Magazine‖color:end‖
Override.entitydescription.tsm_qbu202: The QBU202 model 8.6mm high-precision sniper rifle's barrel is manufactured through cold hammer forging, giving it a very high accuracy lifespan. It employs magazine feeding and uses ‖color:150,0,0,255‖8.6x70mm‖color:end‖ sniper rifle magazine.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_amr2: The AMR-2 ‖color:150,0,0,255‖12.7*108mm‖color:end‖ non-automatic sniper rifle is an anti-material weapon used by infantry snipers to engage high-value targets at long distances, including individual personnel and important equipment. It allows for precise strikes and effective destruction. This model features a heavy barrel, and its non-automatic structure minimizes the number of components that may vibrate at the moment of firing, ensuring shooting accuracy.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_m99: As the war intensifies, soldiers' protection levels have been rising, making existing sniper rifles seem less effective in range and power. The active development of new ‖color:150,0,0,255‖12.7*99mm‖color:end‖ large-caliber sniper rifles has become a new battlefield for military forces. Consequently, light weapons researchers have vigorously pursued the development of semi-automatic large-caliber sniper rifles, leading to the emergence of the M99, which carries the designers' efforts and pride into Europa.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_qbu10: Equipped with a smart thermal optic, even targets in submarines have nowhere to hide, due to its secrecy it would only appear in the most difficult missions to dispatch assasination targets in one shot, uses ‖color:150,0,0,255‖12.7*108‖color:end‖ caliber sniper ammo.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_qlu11: Prototype weapon using ‖color:150,0,0,255‖Sniper Grenade Drum‖color:end‖, the biggest caliber "Gun" yet, in contrast with conventional grenade launchers, the high chamber pressure of a sniper rifle and special armor-piercing grenades, it could shatter targets through submarine hulls. Equipped with an ensemble thermal fire-control system for users to spot targets accurately.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_mg42: A heavy machine gun banned from production under the Europa Convention, its terrifying rate of fire has earned it the nickname "Dictator's Chainsaw" since Earth. Uses ‖color:150,0,0,255‖7.92 MG42 Drum‖color:end‖, with a frenzied muzzle velocity and penetration power rendering any enemy cover laughable; the only downside is its poor endurance.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_56: Lightweight, accurate, and reliable in operation. It uses a gas-operated automatic system and can fire single shots, using ‖color:150,0,0,255‖7.62mm‖color:end‖ rounds.\nBurying bones need not be soft earth; life has green mountains everywhere.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_81: A well-performing weapon with good accuracy, reliable operation, and easy maintenance, this legacy firearm performs well in actual combat, using ‖color:150,0,0,255‖7.62mm‖color:end‖ rounds.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_vk: An aesthetically pleasing modified white submachine gun, capable of mounting pistol sights and suppressors. Uses ‖color:150,0,0,255‖9mm Pistol Magazine‖color:end‖, featuring astonishing rate of fire and almost no recoil. However, due to its unsuitability for submarine warfare environments, it has not been adopted by the military and is only available in small quantities as a collectible within the Sea of Miracles.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_js9: A ‖color:150,0,0,255‖9mm‖color:end‖ caliber suppressed submachine gun, this firearm features a stockless design, with the magazine located behind the pistol grip to shorten the weapon's length, typically also equipped with a suppressor. It operates using a blowback automatic system.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_mp5sd: Uses ‖color:0,200,0,255‖9mm‖color:end‖ Submachine Gun Magazine, a modified version of the standard coalition submachine gun, more favored among security officers, high accuracy, compact structure, the classic locking mechanism makes it even more reliable.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_57_smgmag: A heavy magazine capable of holding 50 rounds, 5.7x28mm ammunition can easily penetrate level three, four, and even five protective vests.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_46_smgmag: Loaded with 25 rounds of 4.6*30 caliber ammo, its design is to lower weight and recoil, and raise penetration to armor. It has a bottleneck shaped shell and sharp tip, steel core and copper coated warhead.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_45_smgmag: Loaded with 25 rounds of .45 caliber ammo, the main advantage of these rounds are its great stopping power and penetration.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_45_smgmag_kr: Loaded with 40 rounds of .45 caliber ammo, though .45ACP rounds have higher recoil，but through design optimizations, such as closed bolt and fire rate reducer, it is possible to effectively control accuracy and recoil.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_9_krmag: A heavy magazine capable of holding 33 rounds.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_9_drum: Holds 50 rounds of 9mm ammunition, currently compatible with Glock 18.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_1143_mag: Holds 12 rounds of the legendary .45ACP caliber ammunition.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_127_mag: Holds 7 rounds of high-powered pistol ammunition; due to its large size, the carrying quantity will be affected.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_stock_pistols:
-30% Spread
+20% Flow resistance
+20% Stun resistance
-10% Movement speed
Override.entitydescription.tsm_pistols_silencers: Lowers firing sound, makes you less of a target, mostly equipped on submachine guns and pistols.\n+5% Spread\n-2% Fire rate
Override.entitydescription.tsm_gun_silencers: Lowers firing sound, makes you less of a target, mostly equipped on assault rifles\n+5% Spread\n-2% Fire rate
Override.entitydescription.tsm_kep:
Sea of Miracles Kinetic Penetrator

Can launch harpoon ammunition and spears
Can install the special battery for the "Three Divine Hills" for assistance

'You are mistaken, our fallen brothers are not standing pine trees, but unbending graves'
Override.entitydescription.tsm_kep_spear: ‖color:211,206,28,255‖Wine is the stomach-piercing poison ‖color:end‖\nKinetic penetrator piercing-type spear ammunition, with an extremely sharp tip that can penetrate some walls.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_kep_spear_he: ‖color:211,206,28,255‖Wrath is the thunderous cannon‖color:end‖\nKinetic penetrator high-explosive spear ammunition, with a small area of explosive damage; beware of friendly fire!
Override.entitydescription.tsm_kep_spear_12: ‖color:211,206,28,255‖Lust is the bone-scraping blade‖color:end‖\nKinetic penetrator shotgun-type spear ammunition that can launch multiple arrows, causing widespread damage.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_kep_spear_heat: ‖color:211,206,28,255‖Wealth is the root of disaster‖color:end‖\nKinetic penetrator grenade-type spear ammunition, with a large explosion radius and a minimum detonation distance.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_kep_battery: Provides ‖color:255,100,100,255‖'Three Divine Hills'‖color:end‖ with powerful energy, increasing firing rate and kinetic energy.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_redemption:
Energy Launcher

Uses energy confinement boxes as ammunition

Has two modes that can be switched freely according to the environment.
Provided by submissions from Crazy Thursday
Override.entitydescription.tsm_redemption_Restrai: Uses [classified] methods to confine energy in this small box, which can effectively utilize this energy when paired with a specific launcher.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_toolbox: Large-capacity briefcase made from alien materials, available for free after-sale application
Override.entitydescription.tsm_weaponbackpack: Has 9 slots for storing weapons, ammunition, or diving suits, and can be worn on the back
Override.entitydescription.tsm_bag_small: Multipurpose small-capacity backpack, simple to make but with limited capacity
Override.entitydescription.tsm_bag_big: Can hold a lot of ammunition and a heavy firearm, effectively enhancing the soldier's sustained combat capability
Override.entitydescription.tsm_bag_heavy: Large backpack that can carry many items and hang a toolbox and a large gun, slightly affecting weapon use and submarine operation
Override.entitydescription.tsm_bag_heavy_big: An even larger backpack, capable of hanging two toolboxes and two large guns. However, its size makes it inconvenient for weapon use and submarine operation.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_bag_diving_special: A backpack distributed only to elites of some special forces within the Coalition, with moderate capacity but two dedicated slots for placing diving suits, and one special point for carrying heavy firearms; however, its large size affects weapon usage.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_bag_diving: Moderate capacity, with a dedicated space for placing a diving suit, but its excessive size can affect weapon usage.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_bag_diving_big: A relatively large backpack with a dedicated space for placing a diving suit, but inconvenient for using tools to repair the submarine.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_mission1: Seems to be part of the experimental logs obtained by soldiers from the station
Override.charactername.TSM_convertible_npc: ARS Company Staff stationed in Sea of Miracles
Override.npctitle.tsm_outpost_combat_npc_a: T.S.M Advanced Combat Unit Field Ops
Override.npctitle.tsm_outpost_combat_npc_j: T.S.M Jiu Zhou Operations Unit Field Ops
Override.tsm.jxg.help: Hi, I'm the Quartermaster of T.S.M, can I help you?
Override.tsm.dh.yjsbm: Use the ally identification code to exchange for items
Override.tsm.dh.faction: Use T.S.M reputation to exchange for items
Override.tsm.dh.faction.25: You need to be above 25 reputation to exchange for supplies
Override.tsm.dh.xh1: Due to the mass chaos, the situation is looking grim, so only these are available for exchange
Override.tsm.dh: I'm here to exchange some items
Override.tsm.no.id: You don't have an ally identification code, please don't waste my time
Override.tsm.no.faction: You don't have enough reputation, please don't waste my time
Override.tsm.d1: Currently, the permits issued by headquarters are several times higher than before. But there's no choice; with the war starting, the situation everywhere is very dire. I hope the war ends soon.
Override.tsm.d2: Sorry, you do not have an official permit. Next time you make this kind of joke, you will be arrested.
Override.tsm.bg1: Please show the permit issued by headquarters
Override.tsm.bg: Sea of Miracles Triton Ammunition Permit Exchange for Tritium Core Pack
Override.tsm.ammo_resupply_next: Remember to use it in a safe place. After we see the signal, we will drop the supplies. It currently includes two Coalition ammo crates + two Separatist ammo crates + two Sea of Miracles ammo crates.
Override.tsm.bg2: Sir, after verification, the permit is genuine. Here is the core pack you need. Please keep it safe.
Override.tsm.t1: Hello, I am an employee of ARS stationed in Sea of Miracles. Is there anything I can help you with?
Override.tsm.arsrw: I saw a new mission on the bounty board, so I came to see if there's anything I can complete.
Override.tsm.other: Hello, someone told me there's a particularly tricky mission right now. I'd like to hear about it.
Override.tsm.ars.11: If you accept, great. Go ahead, live or die.
Override.tsm.ars.22: Refuse, alright, I'll find someone else.
Override.tsm.urgent: Let me take a look, hold on.
Override.tsm.urgent_save_yes: There is indeed an urgent matter. Earlier, a dangerous individual hijacked someone in the Sea of Miracles's shipping lane. We just located their current position, so we need manpower to rescue Miss Qiu right now.
Override.tsm.save_yes_1: Alright, the location has been sent to your terminal. There's no time to lose!
Override.tsm.urgent_save_no: There are no particularly tricky tasks at the moment
Override.tsm_opdeco_hrflyers_1.c1: While you're leisurely walking around, a man dressed as an Coalition soldier calls out to you from behind.
Override.tsm_opdeco_hrflyers_1.o1: Are you calling me? What's the matter?
Override.tsm_opdeco_hrflyers_1.o1.c1: We need to board your ship to reach the next station. If you can take us, we can pay a fee of 5000mk.
Override.tsm_opdeco_hrflyers_1.o2: Uh... I need to check with my crew. If it's okay, we'll call you when we set sail.
Override.tsm_opdeco_hrflyers_1.o3: No problem, we'll wait for your response.
Override.tsm_srm_text.rescuetargetmessage1: You find a young girl, and based on the description from your previous mission, you confirm she's the kidnapped Miss Qiu.
Override.tsm_srm_text.arrested: Miss Qiu, don't be afraid! The Sea of Miracles is here to protect you.
Override.tsm_srm_text.thanks1: Eh? You're the hero who saved me before! Last time I left in such a hurry, I didn't even get to thank you. Hello, my name is Qiu Wu, it's nice to meet you again.
Override.tsm_srm_text.thanks2: “It's fine, it's healed a long time ago...” Qiu Wu wanted to say more, but her pager suddenly rang. She smiled and shook her head, saying, "I was thinking of how to thank you, but it seems I don't have time now. I have to go." After saying this, Qiu Wu ran towards a soldier from Sea of Miracles waving at her in the distance. Halfway through, she turned around and shouted, "Next time! Next time we meet, I'll treat you to a meal!" She disappeared around the corner shortly after.
Override.tsm_srm_text.answer1: Hahaha, not much of a hero, just doing what I should. By the way, how's your injury?
Override.tsm_combat_tsm_event.1: Feline Advisor calling Sea of Miracles, T-31-s emergency! T-31-s emergency! Requesting reinforcements.
Override.tsm_combat_tsm_event.2: Hang on, Advisor. The Chief Instructor ordered me to bring all of you home.
Override.tsm_combat_occupation_event.1: Not good, the nearby quick reaction forces are heading towards this station, we got to hurry!
Override.tsm_combat_beowulf_event.1: Damn it, we intercepted the message sent by the Beowulf squadron, they called for reinforcements. Coalition's nearby quick reaction forces are heading towards this station, we got to hurry.
Override.tsm_combat_yehuo_event.1: Wildfire calling Warhammer squad, contact with enemy, need reinforcements! Need reinforcements!
Override.tsm_darkstormynight.2: This is a bad omen, today's not a good day to die
Override.tsm_darkstormynight.3: Time for a real gunner showdown
Override.tsm_combat_adventists_event_tsm.1: Sea of Miracles Second Station Strike Squad: Reached the designated location, beginning the assault.\n\nAdventist Leader: Fools, they dare come to us! Bring out the modified machines!
Override.jobdescription.tsm_soldier: Part of Sea of Miracles's Advanced Operations Division
Override.missiondescription.tsm_combat_qrf: The Coalition's Quick Response Team is deploying at this abandoned site, preparing to raid a nearby enemy station. The nearby station won't sit idle, and now's your chance to shine. Clear out the Quick Response Team and blow up the reactor!
Override.missionfailure.tsm_combat_qrf: Is this the ending you wished for?
Override.missionmessage0.tsm_combat_qrf: ???:\nWell done, this operation dealt a heavy blow to the Coalition's morale. The money's been deposited into your account, remember, no one gave you orders—it was your own doing.
Override.missiondescription.tsm_combat_beowulf: The Coalition's Beowulf Squad is known for being brutish and unreasonable, but they're tough! With top-tier gear and combat training, they're a hard nut to crack. But the Separatists don't want excuses—prove your team's strength. Take this station and blow up the reactor. Courage and glory will be yours!
Override.missionfailure.tsm_combat_beowulf: Is this the ending you wished for?
Override.missionmessage0.tsm_combat_beowulf: Countless challengers drove their blades deep into the dragon's belly, slaying it. In its final moments, the dragon finally remembered its name—Beowulf.
Override.missiondescription.tsm_combat_occupation: The Coalition's occupation forces are their true elites, known for heavy armor and firepower. They're enforcing military control over this area. The Separatists order us to wipe them out, clearing the path for the forces to come. Captain, make sure you're well-prepared before the fight.
Override.missionfailure.tsm_combat_occupation: Is this the ending you wished for?
Override.missionmessage0.tsm_combat_occupation: The occupation forces watched in disbelief as they were consumed by the reactor's explosion.\nMeanwhile, in another station, Separatists and Coalition soldiers were still locked in combat. The light and heat from the explosion reached them, and they gazed at the same fading flash. What began as political grandstanding had devolved into bloody war; outsiders wish to tear each other apart, while those truly involved just want to go home.
Override.missiondescription.tsm_combat_coalition: A small squad of Coalition soldiers is active in this area, considering the Separatist-Coalition war declaration. They probably won't welcome your arrival. If you're looking to make friends with the Coalition, it's best not to get involved.
Override.missionfailure.tsm_combat_coalition: Is this the ending you wished for?
Override.missionmessage0.tsm_combat_coalition: Separatist Liaison:\nGlad to see you've chosen the right path, Captain.
Override.missiondescription.tsm_combat_separatist: The locals oppose the Coalition forces stationed at [location1]. After the Coalition withdrew, the Separatists sneaked into the station. As keepers of order on Europa, we can't tolerate such behavior. Captain, raid the station and eliminate their leader, show the Separatists who's in charge.
Override.missionfailure.tsm_combat_separatists: Is this the ending you wished for?
Override.missionmessage0.tsm_combat_separatists: Coalition Liaison:\nCaptain, we can't let up after this; there are more battles ahead.
Override.missiondescription.tsm_combat_Anonymous: Captain, reports of riots have reached the General. Lately, he hasn't been in the best mood. I think we need to take action. I've located [location1], where an elite Separatists unit, the Shadow Raiders, are setting up. They're planning attacks on nearby stations, and now's the time to strike! Wipe out all the raiders and blow up the reactor.
Override.missionfailure.tsm_combat_Anonymous: Is this the ending you wished for?
Override.missionmessage0.tsm_combat_Anonymous: Coalition Liaison:\nCaptain, the General received word of our victory and commended us. We've also uncovered the mastermind behind the Separatists' 'uprising'—General Victoria Petran. Time to plan the next operation.
Override.missionname.tsm_combat_yehuo: Wildfire - The Final Blooming Crimson Flower
Override.missiondescription.tsm_combat_yehuo: The Wildfire Separatists have weakened the Coalition's control over this sea by wiping out the stationed forces at [location1]. After taking over most of the stations, they are planning one final strike. Captain, Wildfire Separatists are an elite force under General Victoria Petran, and they have heavy firepower. We need to quickly mobilize to counter this attack. Target: Eliminate all Separatists forces and destroy the reactor.
Override.missionfailure.tsm_combat_yehuo: Is this the ending you wished for?
Override.missionmessage0.tsm_combat_yehuo: The last Separatist member fell, yelling, "We'll burn like wildfire! One day, the Coalition will be consumed!"\nWhat do people truly seek? Endless conflict, bloodshed to make flowers bloom?
Override.tsm_haulagecombat_1.c1: There's an urgent contract. Our cooperation depends on this. A group of overconfident worms think they can chew through a hot potato. If you're willing, the pay will be generous.
Override.missiondescription.tsm_haulagecombat_1: A group of blind pirates stole some data modules containing personal information. I don't want them being sold. Either they die, or they disappear with the goods. (Note: The ship's hull is indestructible, so feel free to board, but beware the slow ship cannons.)
Override.missionfailure.tsm_haulagecombat_1: Disappointing, but I think the black market might have better partners than you.
Override.missionmessage1.tsm_haulagecombat_1: The price for spying has been paid. Now, let's discuss other business.
Override.missiondescription.tsm_combat_crosstalk:
Calling Red Turquoise, Red Turquoise, do you copy?
Damn, they've jammed our signal. Wait, there's a submarine docking.
..........
Where have you all been? We need reinforcements!
This is Sunset's Abyss Squad, preparing to intercept.
Drive these Coalition dogs off our turf!
Override.missionfailure.tsm_combat_crosstalk: Report, Sunset Operations, Second Assault Team, all members KIA.
Override.missionmessage0.tsm_combat_crosstalk: Thank you, Captain, for handling those Coalition interference squads. Don't worry, we won't disclose any information about you.
Override.missiondescription.tsm_combat_escort: An armed Coalition squad needs a ride to the next station, but they seem suspicious. Better be cautious.
Override.missionsuccess.tsm_combat_escort: Coalition thugs should be fed to the abyss.
Override.missionfailure.tsm_combat_escort: This vessel has been commandeered for military use.
Override.missionmessage0.tsm_combat_escort: You Coalition dogs, get off my ship!
Override.missiondescription.tsm_combat_aria:
Previously, we found a Adventists' site conducting human control experiments. After sending a team to raid it, we lost contact.
According to life signs, they're still alive, but likely controlled.
We have no solution, so we must sacrifice the team. Captain, eliminate everything alive at the site.
Be cautious—some members of the team have been issued Triton magazines.
Override.missionsuccess.tsm_combat_aria: Next time you pass by, Europa will be without us.
Override.missionfailure.tsm_combat_aria: Mission failed, HQ has dispatched a more elite team for extermination.
Override.missionheader0.tsm_combat_aria: I feel like a decaying corpse, lonely and helpless.
Override.missionmessage0.tsm_combat_aria: The sun has risen, the darkness remains behind, but the sun isn't ours—we must sleep.
Override.missiondescription.tsm_adventists_save: We've pinpointed Ms. Qiu's location at [location1], likely captured by the Adventists. We need to rescue her and ensure her safe transport to the Sea of Miracles station.
Override.missionsuccess.tsm_adventists_save: Mission complete, we'll handle the escort from here.
Override.missionmessage0.tsm_adventists_save: As she left, she kept looking back, as if trying to remember your face.
Override.missiondescription.tsm_combat_advisers: Recently, our forces noticed something peculiar during fights with the Separatists: their tactics seem familiar and target the Coalition precisely. These tactics were used by Sea of Miracles during prior operations, leading us to believe someone from Sea of Miracles is advising them.\nAccording to intel, the Feline Consultant is in this building, along with elite Separatists. The goal is to eliminate all Feline military advisors.
Override.missionfailure.tsm_combat_advisers: Tonight, the stars will drown in the water.
Override.missionmessage0.tsm_combat_advisers: Obstacles and bullets—they block the path, but we laugh and boldly charge through.
Override.missiondescription.tsm_combat_adventists: Based on stolen data, the bandits are now working with the Adventists. We'll use this chance to wipe them out. A squad will assist you in raiding the site. They're ready and will coordinate with your actions.
Override.missionfailure.tsm_combat_adventists: We should've acted, but kept stalling.
Override.missionmessage0.tsm_combat_adventists: First time cooperating with you on a raid. Let's hope for better coordination next time.
Override.missiondescription.tsm_combat_nz: Skilled marksmen have taken this site, all armed with handcannons, eager for a fair duel.
Override.missionfailure.tsm_combat_nz: The first shot announces my arrival; the second seals your fate.
Override.missionmessage0.tsm_combat_nz:
The bullet pierced his brain, and in his daze, he seemed to be on stage, seeing a dark audience. Yet, he clearly heard two voices.
“Who is performing?” one asked.
The other replied, “The performer, awkward but skillful, is either a clown or a king.”
As the words fell, applause erupted, and an ode to joy began.
Ladies and gentlemen, this is Solomon's end.
Override.tsm_escort_lm: The situation has changed. Everyone drop your weapons; we're commandeering this ship for military use.
Override.loadingscreentip: Yakhi Crystals can be bought at difficulty 25+ stations. You might also find them in ruins or shipwrecks.\n—The Sea of Miracles
Hengberli Stars are only sold in cities or research centers at difficulty 40+. If you're lucky, you might find some in ruins or shipwrecks.\n—The Sea of Miracles
Some parts for Chariot and Raven can be purchased at various stations, but the main gun has been lost. Maybe it's in a shipwreck?\n—Sea of Miracles
ARS, known for its automatic recording products, collects data to trade or strengthen internal forces.\n—The Sea of Miracles
Rumor has it that the Adventists are erecting 'Beacons' at abandoned sites.\n—The Sea of Miracles
Sea of Miracles began in the dark waters of the Sunless Sea (better known as Aphotic Plateau.)\n—The Sea of Miracles
The Coalition and the Separatists are engaged in full-scale war.\n—The Sea of Miracles
As the war intensifies, Sea of Miracles's board reported that escort service income has surpassed other sectors for the first time, with plans for further investment.\n—The Sea of Miracles
After long construction, the Ice City project is finally complete. Once all inspections pass, it will open to the public for residence and commerce.\n—The Sea of Miracles
DS104 border station lost contact. Sea of Miracles has dispatched personnel to investigate.\n—The Sea of Miracles
Sea of Miracles has three armed divisions: Advanced Operations, Sunset Operations, and Jiu Zhou Operations, focused on human combat, corporate security, and monster combat respectively.

Sea of Miracles remains a corporation, yet it plays a key role in Europa's development, city-building, and tech research. Its subsidiaries cover almost every industry on Europa, from military manufacturing to medical, schools, shipyards, and even its own Widow Station.
After showing 'miracles,' the Adventists gained followers exponentially, including some high-ranking Coalition officials.\n—The Sea of Miracles

The Adventists' goal is to bring their unique god to Europa, but the god requires a vessel, and none of Europa's life forms are suitable. Their current mission is to create a perfect host.\n—The Sea of Miracles
The Separatists are now more dangerous and powerful, aiming to overthrow the Coalition's iron rule.\n—The Sea of Miracles
Communication has advanced, but limitations remain.\n—The Sea of Miracles
Whether it's the Coalition, Separatists, or Sea of Miracles's forces, they all call for reinforcements upon seeing the first enemy. Be cautious.\n—The Sea of Miracles
